text: Many valid points here. Our allies do impose unfair tariffs & non-tariff barriers on us. Today, on #WorldOceansDay, I introduced the SAVE Right Whales Act to help reduce the impacts of human activities on North Atlantic right whales.
 
There are only 450 of these whales remaining in the world—if we don’t take immediate action they could go extinct in our lifetimes.
